title: Destined Martial God - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts   Xuanhuan
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Male Protagonist   Martial Spirits   Second Chance   Time Travel   Weak to Strong
author: Yan Yun Yu Qi   烟云雨起
description:
Jin Lin was not an object within the pond; he would transform into a dragon upon meeting the wind and clouds!

Yu Haoran returned to his youth. Not only did he retain all the memories of his past life, but he also obtained omniscient and omniscient domain towers that could accelerate time.

Look at him: Seize opportunities, seize good fortune, destroy enemies, stir up trouble!

This was a story of leveling up and killing monsters.>
